title: 25 game chat restriction? You kidding me riot.
body:
So this is my first offense and immediately i get a 25 game chat ban? IM just trying to learn the game and my entire team flamed me all game and harassed me and IM the one who gets punished? Fuck this trash fucking game garbage fucking system. What a extreme joke of a game.




Game 1
Pre-Game
Trippy Zed and I: mid
Trippy Zed and I: yolo
Trippy Zed and I: i can jungle
Trippy Zed and I: need a good leash

In-Game
Trippy Zed and I: quin is cancer
Trippy Zed and I: ^
Trippy Zed and I: nice red watch
Trippy Zed and I: lmao
Trippy Zed and I: thats y u dont over extend
Trippy Zed and I: w t f
Trippy Zed and I: wtf
Trippy Zed and I: yasuo so fucking blind jesus christ
Trippy Zed and I: we lost this fucking game useless garbage fucking game
Trippy Zed and I: im just playing the game


Post-Game
Trippy Zed and I: non stop flame from these lcs pro players
Trippy Zed and I: just playing the game
Trippy Zed and I: stop with the harrass
Trippy Zed and I: and im feeding right
Trippy Zed and I: you all died more
Trippy Zed and I: its fucking ironic
Trippy Zed and I: its amazing
Trippy Zed and I: "inting"
Trippy Zed and I: wtf?
Trippy Zed and I: you guys
Trippy Zed and I: are sto
Trippy Zed and I: toxic
Trippy Zed and I: repoted
Trippy Zed and I: everyone
Trippy Zed and I: dude
Trippy Zed and I: youre fucking ridiculous
Trippy Zed and I: i dont even have emotes to spam
Trippy Zed and I: you are legit making up lies in post chat
Trippy Zed and I: so you can have grounfds to report me
Trippy Zed and I: im learnignt o play the game
Trippy Zed and I: i was junlging
Trippy Zed and I: while yall fed
Trippy Zed and I: and im the bad one
Trippy Zed and I: cuz i forced you to die
Trippy Zed and I: right
Trippy Zed and I: ?
Trippy Zed and I: exactly
Trippy Zed and I: a lvl 9 game
Trippy Zed and I: wgere everyone flamed me
Trippy Zed and I: and tikd me i was not doing anything on purpose on the fountain
Trippy Zed and I: thats ridiculou
Trippy Zed and I: riot can see the replay
Trippy Zed and I: the system knows if youre afk
Trippy Zed and I: no

replies.body:
I’ve edited your title. I encourage you to discuss things in a civil manner. 

~~It appears you have also edited your chat logs. Please share them in full. ~~ nvm. That doesn’t appear to be the case. 

If you have any questions or concerns you can reach us on the boards discord.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BigEv8p2,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-07-31T15:48:49.480+0000)
> It appears you have also edited your chat logs. Please share them in full. 

He did?

~~I think so. It strangely jumps from game 1 to another game.~~

Nah I think I jumped the gun. I figured when he started talking about emotes that he was in a new game.
I don't need to read the chat logs to figure out how toxic you are, the title is more than enough for me.
If you are just trying to learn the game then why aren't you playing with bots?

> [{quoted}](name=Trippy Zed and I,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BigEv8p2,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-31T15:22:49.836+0000)
>
> So this is my first offense and immediately i get a 25 game chat ban? IM just trying to learn the game and my entire team flamed me all game and harassed me and IM the one who gets punished? Fuck this trash fucking game garbage fucking system. What a extreme joke of a game.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Game 1
> Pre-Game
> Trippy Zed and I: mid
> Trippy Zed and I: yolo
> Trippy Zed and I: i can jungle
> Trippy Zed and I: need a good leash
> 
> In-Game
> Trippy Zed and I: quin is cancer
> Trippy Zed and I: ^
> Trippy Zed and I: nice red watch

not sure who this is referring to or what happened but it sounds like it's sarcasm and you're talking about someone who got ganked. This isn't helping your case as to why you shouldn't have gotten a chat restriction.

> Trippy Zed and I: lmao
> Trippy Zed and I: thats y u dont over extend

So rather than be constructive, you laugh at your team and act condescendingly towards them. Again not helping your case.

> Trippy Zed and I: w t f
> Trippy Zed and I: wtf
> Trippy Zed and I: yasuo so fucking blind jesus christ

Flaming your teammate. Not helping either.

> Trippy Zed and I: we lost this fucking game useless garbage fucking game

Blaming your teammate and flaming your teammate. You have a pattern of negative behavior.

> Trippy Zed and I: im just playing the game
> 
> 
> Post-Game
> Trippy Zed and I: non stop flame from these lcs pro players
> Trippy Zed and I: just playing the game
> Trippy Zed and I: stop with the harrass
> Trippy Zed and I: and im feeding right
> Trippy Zed and I: you all died more
> Trippy Zed and I: its fucking ironic
> Trippy Zed and I: its amazing
> Trippy Zed and I: &quot;inting&quot;
> Trippy Zed and I: wtf?
> Trippy Zed and I: you guys
> Trippy Zed and I: are sto
> Trippy Zed and I: toxic
> Trippy Zed and I: repoted
> Trippy Zed and I: everyone
> Trippy Zed and I: dude
> Trippy Zed and I: youre fucking ridiculous
> Trippy Zed and I: i dont even have emotes to spam
> Trippy Zed and I: you are legit making up lies in post chat
> Trippy Zed and I: so you can have grounfds to report me
> Trippy Zed and I: im learnignt o play the game
> Trippy Zed and I: i was junlging
> Trippy Zed and I: while yall fed
> Trippy Zed and I: and im the bad one
> Trippy Zed and I: cuz i forced you to die
> Trippy Zed and I: right
> Trippy Zed and I: ?
> Trippy Zed and I: exactly
> Trippy Zed and I: a lvl 9 game
> Trippy Zed and I: wgere everyone flamed me
> Trippy Zed and I: and tikd me i was not doing anything on purpose on the fountain
> Trippy Zed and I: thats ridiculou
> Trippy Zed and I: riot can see the replay
> Trippy Zed and I: the system knows if youre afk
> Trippy Zed and I: no

Yeah, you definitely deserve a chat restriction. Whether it's 25 games or 10 games, you deserve a chat restriction. Your title also indicates more evidence of your toxic behavior. 

My suggestion is to stop insulting people, stop flaming people, stop being sarcastic, be constructive, promote teamwork, and foster a cooperative environment. 

Making people hate you in game doesn't make you win more when you have to depend on them cooperating with you and working with you as a team.
You literally just showed us evidence as to why your ban is valid

This is clearly a smurf account right? If you are "just learning the game" and lvl 9 then you wouldn't talk about league and use certain terms and words you did. Im not excusing the behavior of the other players but you should have known better
Might be better if you just leave altogether if you can't get your act together. No grown-ass man talks like this and doesn't understand why they were punished.

>Trippy Zed and I: repoted 

Yeah you were reported

No one flames for no reasons.

Your opener was to call yasuo blind, and blame the game on your "garbage teammates"
its just a chat restriction, just don't talk and hopefully you'll learn from flaming.
I find it hard to believe you were being harassed all game and just defended yourself when the first thing you do is flame yas.
